The title says it all: get out of your command pod and use your EVA jet-pack to "push" your stranded pod into an orbit that will land it on Kerbin in one piece.

This is less of a skill based challenge and more a patience based one, as pushing a command pod takes time, and you could get from anywhere seeing as the pack doesn't actually drain your mono-propellant in your capsule as of 1.0, but I have saved many a Kerbal by pushing half the way home, and i find it relaxing if not fun to WÃŒÂ¶aÃŒÂ¶tÃŒÂ¶cÃŒÂ¶hÃŒÂ¶ ÃŒÂ¶KÃŒÂ¶eÃŒÂ¶rÃŒÂ¶bÃŒÂ¶aÃŒÂ¶lÃŒÂ¶sÃŒÂ¶ ÃŒÂ¶dÃŒÂ¶oÃŒÂ¶ ÃŒÂ¶sÃŒÂ¶eÃŒÂ¶mÃŒÂ¶iÃŒÂ¶-ÃŒÂ¶mÃŒÂ¶aÃŒÂ¶nÃŒÂ¶uÃŒÂ¶aÃŒÂ¶lÃŒÂ¶ ÃŒÂ¶lÃŒÂ¶aÃŒÂ¶bÃŒÂ¶oÃŒÂ¶uÃŒÂ¶rÃŒÂ¶ Save kerbals from the depths of space slowly but surely.

Rules/notes:

The pod to be used should be a Mk 1 command pod with a Mk 16 Parachute and a 1.25 metre heat-shield on it.

it is recommended to use hyper-edit-like mods to get your pod into the right orbit, but obviously don't use it to edit your spacecraft back into the atmosphere

Set heating effects to whatever you feel comfortable with, I use 100% to live on the edge

Feel Free to quick-save/load if you run out of fuel and jeb floats off into space or you burn up in the atmosphere.

To "participate" post on this thread with a screenshot of the pod starting in the designated Mode orbit from the orbital view, one of your ship in it's "pushed home" orbit with a recommended periapsis of about 25,000 metres, and one of it landed or about to land, this time in ship view.

warning: Mode names partially reflect starting distance from Kerbin and may not accurately describe difficulty. hey, it's my first time doing this, don't look at me like that!

"Modes":

Simple Mode - 5,000,000 metre apoapsis, 400,000 metre periapsis around Kerbin

Easy Mode - 4,000,000 metre apoapsis, 2,000,000 metre periapsis around Kerbin

medium Mode - 4,000,000 metre circular orbit

Difficult Mode -2,000,000 metre circular orbit around The Mun

Hard Mode - 50,000,000 metre apoapsis, 10,000,000 metre periapsis around Kerbin

Even Harder Mode - 14,000,000,000 metre circular orbit around The Sun/Kerbol

Manley mode - 20,000,000 metre circular orbit around Duna! *gasp*

Bonus points (there's not actually a point system) if you land on top of the VAB

Thanks anyone who read this far, if you give it a try but give up, show us all how you did anyway!
